name: tenki jp
css:
@namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml);

@-moz-document domain("www.tenki.jp") {
  
  header#header,
  p#page_top,
  div#ad_lite_north,
  div#ad_lite_panel_1,
  div#ad_lite_panel_2,
  div#ad_lite_panel_3,
  div#ad_lite_ft,
  div#gn_expand_area,
  div.sns_box_buttons,
  div.forecast_point_other_link,
  a.free_login_button,
  span.fs_m1,
  div#lite_attention,
  div#logly-lift-widget,
  div#ft_contents_link,
  div#geniee_overlay,
  [src*="logly.co.jp"],
  [href*="logly.co.jp"]
  { display:  none !important;}
  
  
}
